In England, in the seven days to 14 May, there were 11,819 new confirmed cases (21.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 07 May, there were 11,426 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 3% (393 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 19 May is 3,887,954 (6,907.4 cases per 100,000 population).
